content: COPENHAGEN  Sept 14 Danish wind turbine manufacturer Vestas Wind Systems said late on Friday it had received a 200 megawatt turbine order from Xcel Energy Inc.  for a wind project in the United States.
name: Xcel Energy Inc
title: Vestas gets 200 MW order in the USA
